description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 1st August 2017 (RN:16/08454/FULL) (as amended by Non-Material Amendments dated 1st August 2024 and 15th May 2020, RN's: 24/00853/NMA and 20/02388/NMA) for: 'Demolition of existing building and redevelopment to provide a new building comprising basement, ground and six upper floors. Use of basement, ground and first floors for restaurant purposes (Class A3) at ground floor level to Cranbourn Street. Use of upper floors as nine self-contained residential flats'. Namely, to allow for internal changes to plan form, changes to shopfront to account for omission of ticket booth, amendments to the fascia and inclusion of canopies, amendments to fenestration and openings, inclusion of ground floor doors, and amendments to the roof level plant, enclosure and lift overrun.
